definitions.definition: A pipe or duct that carries gaseous combustion products away from the point of combustion (such as a furnace ).
An enclosed passageway in which to direct a current of air or other gases along.
A woolly or downy substance; down , nap ; a piece of this.
In an organ flue pipe , the opening between the lower lip and the languet .

main_definition: A pipe or duct that carries gaseous combustion products away from the point of combustion (such as a furnace ).
secondary_definitions: An enclosed passageway in which to direct a current of air or other gases along.
( obsolete , countable and uncountable ) A woolly or downy substance; down , nap ; a piece of this.
In an organ flue pipe , the opening between the lower lip and the languet .
